sentences.en: Callisthenics can improve joint flexibility and muscle tone.
sentences.cn: 体操能提高关节的柔韧性和肌肉的和谐性.

sentences.en: Don't just sit around ! Go for a walk, jog, swim or cycle. For a change, try dancing or doing callisthenics in time to your favourite tunes.
sentences.cn: 不要总是坐着不动！去散散步、慢跑、游泳或骑自行车。要不，换换方式，去跳舞或随着所喜欢的音乐节拍做健美体操。

sentences.en: There are three main groups of exercises: aerobic exercises, callisthenics and anaerobic exercises.
sentences.cn: 主要有三种运动: 有氧运动 、 体操和无氧运动.
